articles.title: Golden Village reserves halls for vaccinated cinemagoers, offers free drink with purchase of food - AsiaOne
articles.description: Calling all vaccinated cinemagoers, Golden Village (GV) has just the deal for you! With their Max Perks with Vax campaign, fully vaccinated guests will be able to access reserved cinema halls — called Vaxed Halls — as well as enjoy a free drink when they purc…
articles.content:
Calling all vaccinated cinemagoers, Golden Village (GV) has just the deal for you!
